paragraphs.zh-tw: Francesca Fedeli: Ciao. So he's Mario. He's our son. He was born two and a half years ago, and I had a pretty tough pregnancy because I had to stay stillin a bed for, like, eight months.
paragraphs.en: 弗蘭且斯卡‧費達利：大家好 他是馬里奧，我們的兒子 他在兩年半前出生 我懷孕的過程很艱難 我必須在床上待八個月

paragraphs.zh-tw: But in the end everythingseemed to be under control. So he got the right weight at birth.
paragraphs.en: 但最後一切看來還算好 他出生時體重標準

paragraphs.zh-tw: He got the right Apgar index. So we were pretty reassured by this.
paragraphs.en: 阿普伽新生兒評分（皮膚、脈搏、反應、肌肉張力、呼吸）也正常 所以我們都很放心

paragraphs.zh-tw: But at the end, 10 dayslater after he was born, we discovered that he had a stroke. As you might know, a stroke is a brain injury.
paragraphs.en: 但他出生後十天 我們發現他中風過 你或許會知道 中風是一種大腦損傷

paragraphs.zh-tw: A perinatal stroke could be something that can happenduring the nine months of pregnancy or just suddenly after the birth, and in his case, as you can see, the right part of his brain has gone. So the effect that this strokecould have on Mario's body could be the fact that he couldn'tbe able to control the left side of his body.
paragraphs.en: 產期中風可能 發生在懷孕期間的九個月內 或在出生之後突然發生 你可以看到他的情況是 他失去了右邊的大腦 那次中風可能會對馬里奧的身體有不良影響 他或許不能夠控制 他左邊的身體

paragraphs.zh-tw: Just imagine, if you havea computer and a printer and you want to transmit,to input to print out a document, but the printer doesn'thave the right drives, so the same is for Mario. It's just like,he would like to move his left side of his body, but he's not ableto transmit the right input to move his left arm and left leg.
paragraphs.en: 請試想一下，假如你有一台電腦和一台印表機 你要傳送、輸入或列印一份文書檔案 但是印表機沒有合適的驅動程式 馬里奧就是這樣的情況 比如，如果他想移動左邊身體 但是他不能夠傳送正確的輸入信號 去移動他的左臂和左腿

paragraphs.zh-tw: So life had to change. We needed to change our schedule.
paragraphs.en: 生活必須作出改變 我們需要更改日程表

paragraphs.zh-tw: We needed to change the impactthat this birth had on our life. Roberto D'Angelo: As you may imagine, unfortunately, we were not ready.
paragraphs.en: 我們需要改變這次生育 對我們生活的影響 羅伯特‧D‧安傑羅：也許你們能想像到 不幸地是我們還沒有準備好

paragraphs.zh-tw: Nobody taught us how to dealwith such kinds of disabilities, and as many questions as possible started to come to our minds. And that has been really a tough time.
paragraphs.en: 沒人教導我們怎樣處理這樣子的殘疾 接著很多問題陸續浮現 湧向心頭 這真是一段艱難的時期

paragraphs.zh-tw: Questions, some basics, like, you know, why did this happen to us? And what went wrong? Some more tough, like, really, what will be the impact on Mario's life? I mean, at the end,will he be able to work? Will he be able to be normal? And, you know, as a parent,especially for the first time, why is he not going to be better than us? And this, indeed, really is tough to say, but a few months later, we realized that we were really feeling like a failure. I mean, the only real product of our life, at the end, was a failure.
paragraphs.en: 一些基本的問題，例如， 為什麼會這會發生在我們身上 還有那裡出了問題？ 一些更艱深的問題，比如說， 這樣子對馬里奧的生活帶來什麼衝擊？ 我的意思是最終他能否工作？ 他能變回正常嗎？ 而且作為一名家長，尤其第一次 為什麼他不會比我們好一些呢？ 然而這個問題卻真的難以說出口 但是數個月之後，我們意識到 我們感到失敗： 我們生命中唯一真實的產物 最終卻失敗了

paragraphs.zh-tw: And you know, it was not a failurefor ourselves in itself, but it was a failurethat will impact his full life. Honestly, we went down.
paragraphs.en: 而且，你知道嗎，這並不是我們自己的失敗 而是這項失敗將會影響他的一生 坦白說，我們感覺很失落

paragraphs.zh-tw: I mean we went reallydown, but at the end, we started to look at him, and we said, we have to react. So immediately, as Francescasaid, we changed our life.
paragraphs.en: 是非常的失落，然而最後 我們開始看著馬里奧 我們對自己說，必須要做些什麽 所以，就像弗蘭且斯卡說的那樣，我們立即改變了生活

paragraphs.zh-tw: We started physiotherapy,we started the rehabilitation, and one of the pathsthat we were following in terms of rehabilitationis the mirror neurons pilot. Basically, we spent monthsdoing this with Mario.
paragraphs.en: 我們開始進行物理療法、我們開始長期復健照料 我們遵循的復健治療路徑之一 就是鏡像神經元試驗計劃 基本上我們花了幾個月與馬里奧一起做

paragraphs.zh-tw: You have an object, and we showed him how to grab the object. Now, the theory of mirrorneurons simply says that in your brains, exactlynow, as you watch me doing this, you are activatingexactly the same neurons as if you do the actions.
paragraphs.en: 我們拿著一件物體，給他展示 如何抓取這東西 鏡像神經元理論表明 當你看著我的動作時，你的大腦 也確切地啟動了相同神經元 就像你也做著同樣的動作

paragraphs.zh-tw: It looks like this is the leadingedge in terms of rehabilitation. But one day we found that Mario was not looking at our hand.
paragraphs.en: 這看來似乎是走在時代尖端的復健治療 但是有一天，我們發現 馬里奧並不是看著我們的手

paragraphs.zh-tw: He was looking at us. We were his mirror.
paragraphs.en: 他看著我們 我們就是他的鏡像

paragraphs.zh-tw: And the problem, as you might feel, is that we were down, we were depressed, we were looking at him as a problem, not as a son, notfrom a positive perspective. And that day reallychanged our perspective.
paragraphs.en: 或許你能感覺到，這是一個問題 我們也很低迷、很沮喪 我們視他為一個難題 而不是兒子，不從正面角度來看 但從那天開始，我們試著換一個角度去看

paragraphs.zh-tw: We realized that we had to become a better mirror for Mario. We restarted from our strengths, and at the same timewe restarted from his strengths.
paragraphs.en: 我們意識到為了馬里奧 我們必須成為更好的鏡像 我們從我們的強項重新出發 同時也從他的強項重新出發

paragraphs.zh-tw: We stopped looking at him as a problem, and we started to look at himas an opportunity to improve. And really, this was the change, and from our side, we said, "What are our strengthsthat we really can bring to Mario?" And we started from our passions.
paragraphs.en: 我們不再看待他為一項難題 而是一次進步的機會 真的，這就是改變 在我們這邊，我們問自己， 「我們有什麼強項，真的能給馬里奧帶來好處？」 那麼我們從熱情開始

paragraphs.zh-tw: I mean, at the end, my wife and myself are quite different, but we have many things in common. We love to travel, we love music, we love to be in places like this, and we started to bring Mario with us just to show to him the bestthings that we can show to him.
paragraphs.en: 我的意思是終究妻子和我 十分不同 但我們也有很多相同之處 我們熱愛旅遊、我們熱愛音樂 我們喜歡來到這樣的地方 我們開始與馬里奧一起來 我們盡力而為給他展示最好的東西

paragraphs.zh-tw: This short video is from last week. I am not saying -- — I am not saying it's a miracle.That's not the message, because we are justat the beginning of the path.
paragraphs.en: 這是上周的錄像 我沒說 - 我沒說這是一個奇跡，這並不是我們想要傳達的訊息 因為我們也只是剛剛起步

paragraphs.zh-tw: But we want to sharewhat was the key learning, the key learning that Mario drove to us, and it is to considerwhat you have as a gift and not only what you miss, and to consider what youmiss just as an opportunity. And this is the messagethat we want to share with you.
paragraphs.en: 但是我們要和大家分享我們從中學到的是， 馬里奧帶給我們夫妻倆的學習要點就是 把你所擁有的看成是一個禮物 而不是你所失去的 而所失去的看成一次機遇 這就是我們要跟大家分享的訊息

paragraphs.zh-tw: This is why we are here. Mario! And this is why -- — And this is why we decided to share the bestmirror in the world with him.
paragraphs.en: 也就是我們來到這裡的原因 馬里奧！ 這就是原因 -- 這就是原因 我們決定與他一起分享這世上最好的鏡像

paragraphs.zh-tw: And we thank you so much, all of you. FF: Thank you. RD: Thank you. Bye.
paragraphs.en: 我們非常感謝大家，每一位 費達利： 謝謝！安傑羅： 謝謝！拜拜！

paragraphs.zh-tw: FF: Thank you.
paragraphs.en: 謝謝大家
